DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to evaluate the mechanisms of recurrent atrial fibrillation after cryoballoon ablation using the Arctic Front Ablation System. For those with pulmonary vein reconnection, specific sites of reconnection will be evaluated with left atrial intracardiac echo (ICE) guidance. The Achieve mapping catheter will be evaluated head-to-head with our current method of ICE-guided recordings from a conventional mapping catheter with high output pulmonary venous pacing.
DOC.brief_title: Atrial Fibrillation Recurrence After Cryoballoon Ablation
DOC.criteria: Patients undergoing redo catheter ablation procedure after index procedure with cryoballoon ablation At least 18 years old Able to read and understand informed consent Unable to give informed consent
